revised_title: Anatomical Structure of the Eye: Microscopical Observations and Drawings
tldr: The author, Everard Home, examines the anatomical structure of the eye using microscopical observations and drawings by F. Bauer. The study focuses on the ciliary processes, choroid coat, and the role of the nigrum pigmentum in the eye's function. The findings contribute to a better understanding of the eye's structure and function in humans and animals.
